title: Customer Satisfaction Survey
description: Help us improve our service by providing your feedback.

elements.name: overallSatisfaction
elements.title: How satisfied are you with our product/service overall?

elements.name: recommendationLikelihood
elements.title: How likely are you to recommend our product/service to others?

elements.name: productFeatures
elements.title: Which features do you find most valuable?

elements.name: lastPurchaseDate
elements.title: When did you last purchase our product/service?

elements.name: customerType
elements.title: What type of customer are you?

elements.name: customerSupportRating
elements.title: How would you rate our customer support?

elements.name: willRepurchase
elements.title: Do you plan to purchase from us again in the future?

elements.name: improvementSuggestion
elements.title: What is one thing we could do to improve your experience?

elements.name: competitorComparison
elements.title: How do we compare to our competitors?

elements.name: additionalFeedback
elements.title: Do you have any additional feedback for us?
